Package com.meltmedia.cadmium.email

Interface Summary
EmailConnection This class represents the connection to the email server.
EmailService  
MailSessionManager  
MessageTransformer Instances of this interface are used to transform messages just before they are passed to the JavaMail API.
SessionStrategy A strategy for accessing the java mail session.
 

Class Summary
Email Base Email Class
EmailConnectionImpl  
EmailLifecycle  
EmailRuleSet  
EmailUtil A set of static utility methods and constants to aid in the creation of javamail messages.
HtmlTextEmail  
HtmlTextEmail.StringAttachment  
IdentityMessageTransformer This message transformer returns the same message that was passed in, without modification.
InternetAddressSet  
JndiSessionStrategy A session strategy that looks up email session from jndi.
Temp  
TestingMessageTransformer  
TestingSessionStrategy A session strategy to use in test cases.
VelocityHtmlTextEmail Adds Velocity Template Processing onto the HtmlTextEmail TODO Clean up this class
 

Exception Summary
EmailException This is the top level exception.
